Title: A Record Left Behind
Text:
Attempt 1
I think I can try. No… I will try.

Attempt 7
Still nothing… O light and fate above, must you torment your most faithful disciple?

Attempt 23
It's no use. I see nothing... Why? How did I succeed before?

Attempt 66
It's fate I'm facing. I should yield... No, no! I will not give in! Get it together, Ariadne! You are a damned Priestess, act like one!

Attempt 67
What now? What should I do? I've said all I know to say! I have nothing left!

Attempt 68
Why was I not born gifted? Why so dull, so blind... Why can't I see the fate?!

Attempt 69
Don't push me! Don't you dare push me! You… and you… You'll break me! No... not you. I... I will break myself.

Attempt 70
I've exhausted every possible way... This is the final attempt. I ▇▇...

Attempt 71
▇, ▇▇... ▇▇▇▇!

Attempt 96
▇▇▇▇? ▇▇, ▇▇▇...

Attempt 101
▇▇▇▇, ▇▇ ▇▇ ▇▇.

The record ends abruptly. Nothing follows.
